attributes.action: Repeal laws on blood donations coming from men who have sex with men.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2015/06/09/missing-letters-blood-donation_n_7541302.html This article and many more show that they are looking for missing blood types or letters, I know a host of people, including myself that has these 'letters' so change and take them! 
As a young peoples group dedicated to campaigning to make sure these letters are not missing anymore.
attributes.background: The NHS keeps claiming that they have a lack of blood and donors, which is unfortunately allowing 3 people to die a day. There is a huge community that is willing to help with this, however they can't. This community tends to be the gay male community but not only gay men.
